keyword: calories in small fry burger king
title: Calories in Small Fries from Burger King
meta_description: Learn calories in small fry Burger King: about 220 kcal per small serving, plus full macros, sodium, and tweaks for custom orders.
h1: Calories in Small Fries from Burger King
assumptions: Standard Burger King small french fries (~76 g), cooked in vegetable oil blend; no added salt or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, oil type, and portion size. Check Burger King app or packaging for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A small order of Burger King fries provides ~220 kcal, 29 g carbs, and 10 g fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with fast food info.

tweaks.label: No salt (reduces sodium but not calories)

faqs.q: How many calories in small fry Burger King?
faqs.a: Approximately 220 kcal for a small serving.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in Burger King small fries?
faqs.a: About 10 g total fat, including 1.5 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Do Burger King small fries have protein?
faqs.a: Yes, roughly 3 g protein per small order.

faqs.q: How much sodium in small fry from Burger King?
faqs.a: Around 290 mg sodium per small serving.
Generally yes, but cross-contamination possible; check with store for allergies.
